channel.title: Little Help
channel.description:
-1 [s]I've got one error after adding droplogs, here is Tut: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=545770.0
ERROR here: http://oi39.tinypic.com/1y5mc1.jpg[/s] Fixed it.
2- After adding doubledoors i got two errros, Here's the Tut: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=526139.0
Here's the errors: http://oi43.tinypic.com/20r1auv.jpg *Note: I've added the Singledoors and i didn't got any errors.
3- Last one, I've added Timedban and i didn't got any errors, But when i try to use the command, Player will disconnect for few seconds (2-3 seconds) Then he login back automatically
Any idea how i can fix any of this errors?
Thanks!

item.title: Little Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Naseem, post:9, topic:526520”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=645266.msg4341243#msg4341243 date=1375202053]
For all the errors…
You need to import Item for #1 and Either Server or objectManager for the second.
[/quote]
I don’t think resolving the 3rd error related to add imports
Because i tried to add it in another server and it worked fine, But i think the problem in RS2LoginProtocolDecoder.java

Anyway thank you :)[/quote]
Make sure that the code is saving the names and times correctly…

Read full topic

item.title: Little Help
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:526520”]For all the errors…
You need to import Item for #1 and Either Server or objectManager for the second.[/quote]
I don’t think resolving the 3rd error related to add imports
Because i tried to add it in another server and it worked fine, But i think the problem in RS2LoginProtocolDecoder.java

Anyway thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Little Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

For all the errors…
You need to import Item for #1 and Either Server or objectManager for the second.

item.title: Little Help
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

Shorty626:

Item is not declared / is declared as a different name.

Alright, I’ll try to find the right name for it

[quote=“Null Amount, post:5, topic:526520”][quote author=Yanev. link=topic=645266.msg4340754#msg4340754 date=1375137651]
hye nassem idk what that problem but can u help me? i have dark spirit server , add me skype: yanev kezel
[/quote]Wat?

  1. Check the casing.
    2.[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=526139.msg4077086#msg4077086 date=1344954473]
    This was one of the few tutorials I actually used when I hosted a long time ago so thanks for this.

^@ invisionx the error is obvious… your variable is not being called or can’t be found. Which means it isn’t where it should be, or you didn’t add it properly.
[/quote] Directly from the thread that you posted.
3. Post the code for the command.[/quote]

Here’s the code for the timedban here: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/368123-pi-timed-bans-no-process.html

About the doubledoors, I think the variable is not being called, So i just need to use imports right?

sk8rdude461:

Imports. Have you heard of them?

In which error i have to add imports? I guess it’s the second one right? (Doubledoors)

Read full topic

^@ invisionx the error is obvious… your variable is not being called or can’t be found. Which means it isn’t where it should be, or you didn’t add it properly.[/quote] Directly from the thread that you posted.
3. Post the code for the command.
